preachers.name: Ben Stuart
preachers.bio: is the pastor of Passion City Church, Washington D.C. and author of single, Dating.

preachers.name: Cody Carnes
preachers.bio: For as long as Cody and Kari can remeber, they've both loved Jesus, has a heart for worship, and been passionate about entering into God's presence.

news.description: Join the gathering of a generation united for Jesus at Passion 2026 in Arlington, TX on January 1-3, 2026. At Passion 2026 18-25 year olds from across the country and around the world are coming together, lifting one voice, declaring one name—JESUS. And the invitation is open: meet us here.
news.title: Coming soon!
